wikipedia_page.main: Major General Denis Arthur Kay Redman, CB, OBE (8 April 1910 – 18 July 2009) was a senior British Army officer. He was Director of Electrical and Mechanical Engineering from 1960 to 1963 and therefore head of the Corps of Royal Electrical and Mechanical Engineers. He served as Colonel Commandant of REME from 1963 to 1968.
